sentence.Network_en: Nanobits , tiny ball - shaped nanoparticles, may harm fish and environment.

sentence.Network_en: She eased the ball - shaped doodad back into its socket.
sentence.Network_cn: 她把那个球形小装饰品慢慢放回它的套子.

sentence.Network_en: It features two fire - linked laser cannons chin - mounted on the ball - shaped cockpit.
sentence.Network_cn: 它的两部火力同步激光炮安装在球型驾驶舱的下部.
